name: Red Hands
description:
Based on the real life game known as slapsies, hot hands, slap jack or hot tomato, Red Hands is one of those classic games that will take you back to the good old times. Go down the memory lane, remember how much fun you had playing Red Hands as a child and give it a go on your computer now.

How to play:

- You need 2 players to play this game
- Once the game starts, one player is the attacker and the other is the defender
- The attacker slaps by clicking once and the defender retreats by clicking at the right time
- If the defender chickens out three times, there will be a free hit granted
- The first player to reach 10 points wins the game

Red Hands is so simple and easy to use so it is a perfect fit for people of all ages. It is competitive but fun and it tests your reflexes. In addition, the game offers a variety of hands to choose from so you can play the game as a monster, an animal or even a comic book character.

We wanted you to have fun and we thought this classic retro game would be just perfect for it. So, add it to your wishlist and once you get to play it, let us know how you liked it. Have fun!
